mainEntity.name: What is GoTeams and how does it fit within GoGroup?

acceptedAnswer.text: GoTeams is a service line of GoGroup, a tech powerhouse founded by entrepreneurs who have built 22 companies themselves. GoTeams focuses on building plug-and-play product and tech teams for founders and corporates with serious ambitions. Unlike typical service providers, GoTeams combines venture experience, proven processes, and a scalable setup that grows with the company.

GoTeams operates globally with delivery hubs in Berlin, Noida, Kathmandu and London. This international footprint allows us to combine European business context with world-class engineering talent. Our distributed setup ensures speed, scalability, and cost-efficiency while keeping teams closely aligned with client ventures.

mainEntity.name: How many employees and professionals work in GoTeams today?

acceptedAnswer.text: Today, GoTeams consists of 100+ product and technology professionals including developers, product managers, UX/UI designers, QA, DevOps, and AI engineers. The teams are not static but they scale dynamically with the needs of each venture, from 3-person startup pods to 50+ member scale-up teams.

mainEntity.name: How is GoTeams different from an outsourcing agency or freelance marketplace?

acceptedAnswer.text: GoTeams is not an outsourcing shop or a gig platform. Instead, we provide long-term, venture-aware product teams. Agencies and freelancers may deliver code for short projects, but GoTeams builds dedicated teams that integrate deeply with your company, aligned to your goals, culture, and scale journey. Think of us as an extension of your founding team and not just a vendor.

mainEntity.name: What types of companies typically work with GoTeams?

acceptedAnswer.text: We partner with venture-backed startups, scale-ups, corporates, and private equity-owned businesses. The common denominator: they all have serious ambitions to scale. GoTeams usually comes in when early solutions like freelancers, agencies, or no-code tools are no longer enough, and the company needs a proper setup to scale product and technology without losing momentum.

mainEntity.name: How does GoTeams ensure quality, integration, and long-term collaboration?

acceptedAnswer.text: GoTeams applies battle-tested processes developed across dozens of ventures: from 3-person startups to unicorns with 150+ engineers. Teams are integrated into partner company's workflows and adapt automatically as companies scale, similar to how AWS scales servers up and down. We also roll out learnings across all teams, so every venture benefits from continuous improvement and shared experience.

mainEntity.name: What advantages does GoTeams offer compared to agencies, freelancers, or in-house hiring?

acceptedAnswer.text: GoTeams offers several key advantages: Speed - Plug-and-play setup delivers execution from day one. Scalability - Teams expand seamlessly with company growth. Venture Awareness - Built by entrepreneurs, for entrepreneurs, we understand GTM, sales, and fundraising beyond just code. Reliability - Long-term, dedicated collaboration instead of transactional projects. Efficiency - Global talent hubs mean top quality at competitive cost. With GoTeams, you don't just get developers, you get a full product team that builds, scales, and adapts with your venture.
